snippet: Philadelphia’s backup, Sergei Bobrovsky, will start in goal against the Rangers on Monday instead of Ilya Bryzgalov.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Philadelphia Flyers will start backup goalie Sergei Bobrovsky, rather than Ilya Bryzgalov, in NHL Winter Classic against the New York Rangers; other NHL news and results noted.
lead_paragraph: Philadelphia’s backup, Sergei Bobrovsky, will start in goal against the Rangers on Monday instead of Ilya Bryzgalov.

headline.seo: Flyers Goalie Bobrovsky Replacing Bryzgalov in Classic
headline.main: Flyers Make Goalie Switch for Classic
headline.print_headline: Flyers Make Goalie Switch For Classic
